title: (x) Sri Lanka Airlines - custom typeface {Richard}
content:
Hi all,   
I am wondering if anyone knows the font used by Sri Lanka: [http://www.airliners.net/open.file/609786/L/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052808/http:/www.airliners.net/open.file/609786/L/)   
   
More examples are on their website: [http://www.airlanka.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052808/http:/www.airlanka.com/)   
   
It looks a bit like Eras, but is different.   
   
Thanks.   
-Will
author: winglets747

comments.content:
The logo is at [Best Brands of the World](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052808/http:/web.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=1&text=lankan)   
   
It does indeed look like it got its original inspiration from Eras. I think a lot of text set in this would be rather hard to read.

Thanks for replying. Yes, a lot of text would be hard to read, but just a few words would be wonderful.   
   
Is there anyway I can get the font?   
   
-Will
Will, try writing the airline and ask the name of their ad agency, maybe they can give you a lead.
